Metadata.title: Martín Galdeano Cañizares | CTO & Tech Lead
Metadata.description: Bridging the gap between scalable technology and human creativity. Architecting systems with logic, leading teams with empathy.

Hero.name: Martín
Hero.title: CTO | Tech Lead | Full Stack Developer
Hero.tagline1: Bridging the gap between scalable technology and human creativity.
Hero.tagline2: Architecting systems with logic, leading teams with empathy.

About.title: About Me
About.quote: To code is to reason. To lead is to understand. I strive to do both with clarity and purpose.
About.intro1: Hello, I'm {name}. I operate at the intersection of technical excellence and strategic leadership. With over a decade of experience developing applications, I've evolved from a hands-on developer to a Tech Lead and CTO, driven by a passion for building robust architectures and fostering healthy engineering cultures.
About.intro2: My journey began with studies in Theoretical Physics at the Complutense University of Madrid, which grounded my approach in complex problem solving. While I handle Python and TypeScript fluently, I also find resonance in the rhythm of poetry and the rigorous logic of philosophy and politics. This unique blend of interests allows me to approach technical problems with a creative, holistic mindset—seeing the code not just as instructions, but as a language of logic that shapes our digital reality.

Projects.metaDescription: A showcase of technical projects ranging from AI-powered platforms to system utilities and automation workflows.
Projects.title: Selected Personal Works
Projects.subtitle: A collection of projects exploring the boundaries of code, logic, and creativity. From low-level system tools to high-level web applications.

atlas.title: Ideological Atlas
atlas.description: A comprehensive platform visualizing the complex landscape of political ideologies through graph theory and interactive node mapping. Explore the connections between different schools of thought.

debaite.title: Debaite
debaite.description: An AI-powered debate platform designed to sharpen critical thinking. Engage in structured arguments against an advanced language model trained to challenge your perspectives.

katia.title: Katia
katia.description: A sophisticated virtual assistant framework built for modularity and extensibility. Handles context-aware conversations and integrates with various system utilities.

restcountries.title: REST Countries CLI
restcountries.description: A blazing fast command-line interface for querying country data. Built for developers who prefer the terminal over a browser tab for quick geographical lookups.

housechecker.title: HouseChecker
housechecker.description: An automated property monitoring workflow built with n8n. Scrapes listing sites, filters by custom criteria, and sends instant notifications to Telegram/Discord.

semantic.title: Semantic Version Tool
semantic.description: A strict utility for managing semantic versioning in CI/CD pipelines. Ensures that version bumps follow the correct major/minor/patch logic based on commit messages.

Personal.metaDescription: Poetry, essays, and music. A personal space for creativity and expression.
Personal.title: Personal Space
Personal.subtitle: A sanctuary for thoughts, rhythms, and verses. Where logic rests and creativity flows.
Personal.poetryIntro: Verses written in the quiet hours. Reflections on nature, existence, and the human condition.
Personal.essaysIntro: Long-form thoughts on technology, philosophy, politics, and the intersection of these.
Personal.handmadeDisclaimer: All written content (Poetry, Essays) is original and handmade. The music tracks are generated using Suno AI.
Personal.noEssays: Essays are being prepared. Check back soon.
Personal.noMusic: Music tracks are being prepared. Check back soon.

la-luna.title: La Luna
la-luna.author: Martín Galdeano Cañizares
la-luna.body:
Ella, nos mira desde la inmensa oscuridad
ella, aunque cambiando, sigue como siempre
ella, sujeta por la fuerza de la gravedad
sospecho que padece, e intuyo que siente.

Dicen que es fría, como un glaciar en deriva
cuentan que gira, para que no veamos sus heridas
hablan de su continua caída, fija y medida
le susurran deseos estando a escondidas.

Su superficie, es un mar de alimento maternal
cubre su interior con un espeso manto doble
y profunda, arde por dentro, con un calor infernal
seguirá estando ahí, aunque aquí el viento no sople.

Naces siempre en la noche nueva y oscura
cuando no te veo y te llamo, desde el oriente me buscas
llena me encuentras y me aplicas tu cura
y cuando por fin te he hallado, al oeste mudas.

¿En qué piensas estando en penumbra?
¿A quién miras con tu rostro velado?
¿Cómo lloras cuando tu piel retumba?
¿Dónde te busco, cuando estoy asustado?

Sé que él te persigue, y siempre te quema
Sé que tú huyes, a la caza de su sombra
Sé que yo te invoco, si me invade la pena.
La luna me cuida, me quiere y me lleva.

libre.title: Libre
libre.author: Martín Galdeano Cañizares
libre.body:
No, no termina donde empieza la tuya.
No, no me basta con que no me amenacen.
No, no quiero que la gente, por miedo, huya.
No, tus definiciones no me satisfacen.

Tú piensas que si nadie te obliga, todo está bien,
que puedes hacer y decir cuanto te plazca mientras no portes un arma.
Que la pureza de tu dicotomía seguro la explica algún gen,
pero creo, que en verdad no estás entendiendo nada.

No es tan sencillo como hablar del bien y del mal,
diciendo, que mientras no obligues, tus palabras son inocuas para la voluntad.
Incitas a un camino ejerciendo tu poder actual,
presionando para que actúen como quieres, según tú, "sin maldad".

Definición maniquea que usas a la defensiva,
disfrutando de una posición superior en la escala social.
Obviando los problemas que provocan tus misivas,
a toda la gente que no goza de un ápice de verdadera libertad.

Y tú hablas de mis privilegios, no de mis derechos,
de los que yo, por poseedor de bálano en cuerpo nevado disfruto.
Pérfido insulto a quienes condicionan sus pechos,
a quienes su tegumento viste y marca, obligando a ser enjutos.

Nunca hablas de persuasión, del silencio implícito de tus sentencias,
nunca defiendes a quienes la presión aplasta en sus decisiones.
Siempre apoyas a cualquiera que sin violencia explícita, realiza sus injerencias,
obviando que Asch ya refutó todas tus disparatadas perversiones.

No, no hay sentido común en tus palabras.
No, no hay sabiduría en tus mentiras.
No, no hay libertad en tus encrucijadas.
Lo único que posees son ideas dañinas.

la-luna.title: La Luna
la-luna.description: A musical interpretation of the poem 'La Luna'. 'She watches us from the immense darkness...'

libre.title: Libre
libre.description: Musical adaptation of the poem 'Libre'. A critique of hollow definitions of freedom.

el-liberal-libertario.title: The Liberal Libertarian
el-liberal-libertario.summary: Analyzing the contradictions of the term 'liberal libertarian', from its origins as a synonym for neofascism according to Clouscard, to the current political reality under Bukele and the fallacy of the Nolan chart.

disertacion-sobre-la-entropia.title: A Dissertation on Entropy
disertacion-sobre-la-entropia.summary: An exploration of the concept of entropy beyond simple 'disorder', connecting Boltzmann's thermodynamics with the direction of time and the heat death of the universe.

valencia-inundada.title: Valencia Flooded
valencia-inundada.summary: An exhaustive analysis of the disaster caused by the DANA in the Valencian Community: the ignored warnings, the management of regional and central administrations, and the dangerous influence of anti-system influencers.

debate-interno-sobre-el-mal.title: Internal Debate on Evil
debate-interno-sobre-el-mal.summary: A philosophical-theological reflection on the problem of evil, Epicurus' paradox and the goodness of God from an agnostic perspective, exploring logical paths to safeguard divine goodness.

la-religion-y-la-politica.title: Religion and Politics
la-religion-y-la-politica.summary: A data-driven analysis using CIS surveys on the relationship between Catholicism and political conservatism in Spain, exploring the historical reasons for this association and its implications for the future of religion.

el-caso-de-begona-gomez.title: The Begoña Gómez Case
el-caso-de-begona-gomez.summary: An analysis of the media case against Begoña Gómez arguing it is a textbook lawfare case, examining the Manos Limpias complaint, Judge Peinado's irregularities and the political context.

queja-y-propuesta.title: Complaint and Proposal
queja-y-propuesta.summary: A critique of the current representative government and a proposal for an alternative system: the certified weighted epistocracy, where voting power adjusts based on the citizen's training in each domain.
